basic_info.description: Im a developer focused on finding innovative ways to efficiently develop, design, and optimize web applications. I'm a hard-working, quick learning individual who strives in pushing myself and learning new things.

projects.title: ResGenie
description: A resume building application for software engineers. Allows developers to edit JSON to build beautiful resumes.

projects.title: Medi Thanks
description: A way to give thanks to frontline workers. This project was built as a part of a hackathon and won as the best overall project. It gives you the ability to create, read, update, and delete thank you cards for healthcare professionals during a time when interactions with that population are minimal. Built with a MERN stack.

projects.title: Kettle
description: This application is a social media platform inspired by Twitter. The idea is that users can come here to share their ideas. Each user can view the posts of other users in the homepage feed or on their wall.
